QuestData.Title: The Darkmoon Faire
QuestData.Description: The Darkmoon Faire is coming! Experience our thrilling games, win fabulous prizes, have your fortune told!$B$BIf you act right now, you can redeem this voucher for free prize tickets and a copy of the world-famous Darkmoon Adventurer's Guide to help you identify treasures in your travels!$B$BJust hand your voucher to Gelvas Grimegate located inside the Faire.$B$BRight now, the entrance to the Faire is outside Goldshire, in Elwynn Forest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Free Ticket Voucher to Gelvas Grimegate, located inside the Darkmoon Faire.
QuestData.CompletionText: Yes friend, may I help you? Do you have a voucher that needs redeeming?
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome to the Darkmoon Faire! This voucher is good for FIVE, yes, FIVE prize tickets and a free copy the world-renowned Darkmoon Field Guide!$B$BWhen you accumulate prize tickets, you'll want to speak to me about redeeming them for valuable prizes. This handy field guide will help you to locate and identify items of value to our collectors here at the faire!
